page.title: 09 Clubs
page.content: Whitstable has a lot of clubs,there are over 100 which include clubs for children,church clubs,sports clubs and clubs that help people.There are 29 clubs for children. Some need uniform such as Boys'Brigade,Girls'Brigade, Scouts,Brownies,Guides. These are connected with churches.Some other church clubs do not need uniform.The most popular club is the "Orbit" where children can play football, table tennis or use the computers. There are 27 sports clubs, 4 of these are watersports,and we have a town football & cricket team. There are 9 clubs that help people such as the deaf, or people with an illness.There are also 4 dancing clubs, 2 choral clubs,4 drama groups and 2 musical societies.There are clubs for the Conservative,Labour,Liberal and Ecology parties.
